oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of Confederate Jesse Washington Carmack
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sgt. Jesse Washington Carmack served in Co. D, 8th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, which consisted of men frm the upper Cumberland Plateau. Having served initially with Gen. Lee in Virginia, the unit in 1862 was sent west to join the Army of Tennessee. The unit suffered heavy casualties at the Battle of Murfreesboro, Tenn. Carmack deserted the Confederate army on December 20, 1864 and took the oath of allegiance on February 14, 1865.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Carmack, Jesse Washington
